column4: everytime i try to open up a torrent, it times out, i've been testing this on files that have several hundred seeds.  I'm guessing the problem is on my end, what could it be?
perhaps .etc.modules is what you are looking for

i dont think /etc/modules is what i'm looking for, in fedora /etc/modprobe.conf contains aliases etc, and i believe it gets checked everytime modprobe is run....../etc/modules says that it contains modules that should be loaded at boot
